comments:
Description:
NPE throws out after click cancle button when insert a chart in layout of library [0001]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070108-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a rptlibrary
2, Drag a chart from palette into layout
3, Click 'Cancel' button to stop the insertion

Expected result:
The chart can not be inserted in layout

Actual result:
There is a blank border in layout, when click the blank area NPE throws out.

Error log:
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException: java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException.createGUIException(GUIException.java:76)
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.util.ExceptionHandler.handle(ExceptionHandler.java:123)
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.util.ExceptionHandler.handle(ExceptionHandler.java:105)
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.extension.ExtendedEditPart.performDirectEdit(ExtendedEditPart.java:157)
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.editors.schematic.editparts.ReportElementEditPart.performRequest(ReportElementEditPart.java:121)

Fixed in local.
We'll Merge to puglic cvs after the network is back
